Summary: I been getting a room here for a about a month or so. Its close to work. They charge me $100 + 10 key fee which you get back. Tonight my husband got the room for $95 on a weekend. If the guy can get something from you later like a mechanic deal then you can get the room cheaper and a lot nicer to you. The vending machine does not work. Had to go to the office. I ask for a non smoking room and always smell smoke and get a room upstairs. My husband got a nice room downstairs with non smoking that actually smelled really nice. Also no two beds from what the guy claims.. Favoritism. Will not stay here again.

The hotel rooms have been updated and [primarily] modernized, and the items that remained, such as the shower fit conveniently into the environment.  My room was neat, the bed was comfortable, the cable selections were excellent and the WiFi was better than most other hotel/motels where I have stayed in the past.  My room was upstairs and closest to the main street, which is Beach Boulevard, and because I am a light sleeper I was worried about traffic noise; I could barely hear it.  The hotel is located close to shopping and restaurants and getting around town is easy.   I would recommend it to my family and friends if they needed a place to stay within the area.  Good quality for the price.  Jay manages the hotel, and may in fact be the owner; he is friendly and very
